An OU helmet sitting on the field before the Bedlam game against Oklahoma State on Nov PERIOD   PERIOD

 threestar quarterback Chandler Morris signed with Oklahoma prior to kickoff at the Under Armour AllAmerica Game PERIOD

Committed BoomerSooner UAALLAMERICA pic.twitter.comD4gImXNm2Q

BREAKING QB Chandler Morris Chandleram4 commits to OUFootball to kick off the  Under Armour AllAmerica Game.UAALLAMERICA pic.twitter.com3kui3YFQNY

Morris is the first quarterback to commit to Lincoln Riley in the  class PERIOD He was originally committed to Arkansas where his father Chad was the head coach PERIOD After Chad was fired on Nov PERIOD  Morris decommitted from the Razorbacks on Nov PERIOD  PERIOD

 Chandler said about his father PERIOD 

His commitment comes a day after the Sooners lost a commitment from  fivestar Brock Vandagriff who is the topranked quarterback in his class PERIOD

Along with Morris Sooner commit Reggie Grimes and signees Marvin Mims Jr. Andrew Raym Anton Harrison and Nathan Anderson will participate in the Under Armour AllAmerica Game PERIOD The game can be watched on ESPN2 and kickoff is at  p.m PERIOD

Success An email has been sent to  with a link to confirm list signup PERIOD
